question: who was the drummer with the travelling wilburys
chain_of_thought_result: The Traveling Wilburys did not have a dedicated drummer as part of the group. Instead, the band members—Bob Dylan, George Harrison, Jeff Lynne, Roy Orbison, and Tom Petty—often played various instruments and shared vocal duties. However, for their recordings, they did use session drummers. Notably, Jim Keltner played drums on many of their tracks.
